meanings.definition: A person or thing that urinates.
meanings.sent1: The little boy was a pisser, always needing to use the bathroom.
meanings.sent2: The dog is a pisser, marking his territory on every tree.
meanings.sent3: The cat knocked over the plant, turning it into a pisser!
meanings.sent4: The leaky faucet in the kitchen was a real pisser, wasting water all day.
meanings.sent5: The old building had a broken pipe, creating a pisser of a mess in the basement.

meanings.definition: Something that is very annoying or frustrating.
meanings.sent1: The constant noise from the construction site was a real pisser for the residents.
meanings.sent2: Losing my keys before an important meeting was a total pisser.
meanings.sent3: The long line at the grocery store was a pisser on a busy day.
meanings.sent4: Her rude comments were a pisser, ruining the mood of the party.
meanings.sent5: Getting stuck in traffic was a pisser, making me late for work.

meanings.definition: A humorous or slang term for a difficult situation or problem.
meanings.sent1: Dealing with a broken car on a road trip can be a real pisser.
meanings.sent2: Running out of coffee in the morning is always a pisser.
meanings.sent3: Forgetting your umbrella on a rainy day is a real pisser!
meanings.sent4: Trying to assemble the furniture without instructions was a pisser of a task.
meanings.sent5: Getting lost in a new city can turn into a real pisser of a situation.
